fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Inspect: You learn the true role of the player who is Executed by the Execution event. 
- Records: Learn 2 non-King players and a role. Neither (50% chance) or One (50% chance) of them is that role. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Autopsy: Choose 2 dead players. You will learn if they share the same faction, Influenceable. This cannot be used on players whose roles are publicly revealed. [1 use, Unique]
- Ties: Choose a dead player. Learn 3 non-King names. One of them shares the same true faction as the dead player. This cannot be used on players whose roles are publicly revealed. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Memoriams: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
